Posts.EditableText:
Hope this is the right forum to post this in but anyway I have been doing regular youtube videos for some time and got bored with just playing games and have been into making games on all sorts of engines like Quest, Unreal Engine, Unity, Gamemaker, Adrift, Inform7, you name I have been working with them. Now with that being said I am in no way a coder and mostly use GUI Editor (Which is quit powerful) but I think beginners maybe able to learn a little without asking 100's of questions on forums(No problem with that just know how frustrating it is) so you can get started with a little more then basics. I know their few videos that cover very very little but no indepth tutorials on quest or lets make an actual working game. So I started new channel dedicated to game creation tutorials for beginners like myself to learn more then just basics.

Channel link https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGSCL0CED0oIG8J1mKyDoMw

Hope to see you there
Mike

PS: Alex if this post is in wrong spot I apologize!
